name: A Deep Dive
description:
How deep is too deep?

We have one goal. To find this out. Your mission is to safely pilot your submarine to the lowest point of the ocean you can reach before the pressure is too much. Once you get to some lower points it may be harder to keep yourself steady, remember to crank that steering wheel til you make it to the bottom.

Controls

Crank to select options in the menu. Turn the crank in the direction pointed by the arrows as fast as possible.
